attributes.action: Clean up the bird contaminant disaster on south coast of England
attributes.additional_details: Upon reading the saddening and unfortunate bird loss disaster on large swathes of the south coast of England, i felt it was helpful to.highlight and emphasize the importance of pinpointing this very worthy issue. Whether it be an unexpected and unforseen.contaminant or possibly another source of irresponsibility, i would very much like this petition signed and adressed at the earliest opportunity. Many thanks in advance of your haste and action.
